rooms.description: Small foyer designed to incorporate natural light and ventilation with large glass panels. Minimalistic Art Deco detailing.

Spacious living area with Art Deco elements such as geometric patterns on the wall accentuating sunlight streaming in through strategically placed windows and skylights. Features built-in storage to maximize space.
Adjacent to the living room with a window overlooking the front yard for enhanced natural ventilation and light, styled in Art Deco style with bold color accents.
Compact yet functional kitchen designed with energy-efficient appliances and large windows ensuring a flow of natural light. Uses cost-effective materials while retaining an Art Deco vibe.
Single bedroom intended for occasional guests; incorporates built-in storage solutions and window for ventilation and natural lighting, adorned with minimalistic Art Deco motifs.
Multipurpose utility area serving as a laundry or study room. Windows are incorporated to ensure adequate natural light and airflow, designed to be flexible on a tight budget.

openings.description: Art Deco styled entrance with streamlined design and modern touches that emphasize natural light entry.
Large windows in each room for enhanced natural ventilation and lighting, following cost-effective yet effective design principles.
A skylight in the living room to maximize daylight and maintain a bright ambiance while keeping costs low.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed with ample natural light through large windows and an ensuite bathroom. Art Deco style is reflected in the geometric patterns on built-in cabinetry.
Compact, efficiently designed bathroom attached to master bedroom featuring moisture-resistant finishes and adequate ventilation.
Additional bedroom that maximizes natural light with a large window and minimalistic design elements drawn from Art Deco principles. Cost-effective materials are used for interior finishes.

openings.description: Large windows to allow maximum natural light and ventilation in bedrooms while maintaining privacy.

rooms.description: Open terrace space on the roof used as an outdoor living area with a swimming pool. Designed to integrate natural light and ventilation while incorporating Art Deco design elements in railings and fixtures.

openings.description: A swimming pool integrated into the terrace for relaxation and enhanced aesthetics. Designed to align with Vastu principles by ensuring proper water flow and energy balance.
